definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: Climbing Peak Junji was a must for ancient people who traveled to Mt. Taishi of Mt. Songshan.
sentences.chinese: 古人游访嵩山太室，莫不以登峻极峰为美谈。

sentences.english: Her daring work behind the enemy lines is now legend.
sentences.chinese: 她在敌后的英勇斗争业迹现在已是传奇美谈。

definition: story or deed that captures the imagination and is spread far and wide
poetic occasion/elegant situation/in literature, the cue for a poem
anecdote/lost or apocryphal story about famous person
object of ridicule/laughingstock/to laugh over sth/to make light chat
for all eternity/throughout all ages/eternity (used in an elegiac couplet, wreath etc dedicated to the dead)
understood by everyone (idiom); well known/a household name
a good reputation to last down the generations
